nodes.text: Kowakian Monkey Island was a poster available in the galaxy during the Clone Wars.

This poster was painted by Amy Beth Christenson, and was developed for The Clone Wars episode "Missing in Action." It is one of several posters based on classic LucasArts adventure games, but done with a Star Wars twist. The title is a reference to the Monkey Island adventure games, and the motif is based on the cover art for the fourth game in the series, Escape from Monkey Island.
